Enhanced False Discovery Rate (EFDR) online documents
===================
  **Andrew Zammit Mangion**
  
  **04-Dec-2014**
  
  Since the main function of this package, `test.efdr`, is computationally intensive, we do not distribute vignettes so as not to bog down CRAN servers during vignette building. Instead we provide two documents on the development page. The first, which demonstrates the functionality of EFDR in tutorial fashion, can be found [here](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/andrewzm/EFDR/blob/master/doc/EFDR.html). The second demonstrates the use of EFDR on sea-surface temperature anomalies and can be found [here](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/andrewzm/EFDR/blob/master/doc/EFDR_SST.html). For raw Markdown versions of the vignettes please visit the [development page](http://github.com/andrewzm/EFDR).
